meanings.definition: A type of charcoal used in drawing.
meanings.sent1: The artist used fusain to create a beautiful charcoal sketch.
meanings.sent2: She bought a set of fusain sticks for her art class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten left paw prints all over the fusain drawings.
meanings.sent4: The fusain charcoal glided smoothly on the paper, leaving dark marks behind.
meanings.sent5: The deep black of the fusain made the drawing look dramatic and bold.

meanings.sent3: The fusain drawing of a cat wearing a top hat always made her smile.
meanings.sent4: Her fusain artwork captured the essence of the bustling city streets.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details in the fusain drawing amazed everyone who saw it.

meanings.sent1: She loved to fusain her favorite landscapes during the weekends.
